column2: Are you currently employed (working for pay)?
During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of your health problems?
During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of any other reason, such as vacation, holidays, time off to participate in this study?
During the past seven days, how many hours did you actually work?
During the past seven days, how much did your health problems affect your productivity while you were working?
column17: 0 = Health problems had no effect on my work
column27: 10 = Health problems completely prevented me from working

column2: During the past seven days, how much did your health problems affect your ability to do your regular daily activities, other than work at a job?
column17: 0 = Health problems had no effect on my daily activities
column27: 10 = Health problems completely prevented me from doing my daily activities
